This App is A Web Browser That is able to open one window , it is in its BETA Version ; It is just used for Learning perposes So the design it in not perfect. Note that when you enter the website in the navigation bar Please include all the link and also add "http://" or "https://" or other . Brooser is a simple safe and light application , Enjoy your use !! :)
